item.title: Data Analytics Consulting Virtual Internship
item.description: The Data Analytics Consulting Virtual Internship by KPMG was my initial guide into the world of data analytics. The entire experience was divided into three modules - Data Quality Assessment, Data Insights, and Presentation. Data Quality Assessment dealed with the preparation and cleaning of data to get it ready for analysis. A dataset related to bicycle sales was provided. Data Insights involved figuring out the high value customers based on customer demographics and attributes.
